changeSet.author: unknow
changeSet.sql: MERGE INTO parts p USING (VALUES({'OEM'}, {'BOSCH'}, {'something'}, {'NORMAL'}, {'FN93428YH'}, {'NMFWER93'})) v ON v.column6 = p.partnum WHEN NOT MATCHED INSERT VALUES(v.columhn1, v.column2, v.column3, v.column4, v.column5, v.column6) WHEN MATCHED UPDATE SET brantype = v.columhn1, brand = v.column2, descr = v.column3, arstat = v.column4, faltpartnum = v.column5;
